Q251 - 3: 2 (Somewhat satisfied) - While there have been some positive developments in terms of increasing political participation by women in India, such as the election of more female representatives to parliament and state assemblies, there is still a long way to go in terms of achieving true gender equality. Women continue to face significant barriers to political participation, including discrimination, bias, and violence.
